participant_1.background:
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
i enjoy running.
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
i love to sew.
i have allergies.

participant_2.background:
While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic.
I decided to follow my dream and started my own ice cream business.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
my idea of flirting is to stare from a distance.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned the value of hard work and perseverance.

content.text: Hello!
Hi!  How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!  How about you?
Pretty good!  I just got back from a run.  How do you stay in shape?
I love to run too!  I also do a lot of snorkeling.  I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin.
That sounds so refreshing!  I've never been snorkeling before.  Have you ever been to Hawaii?
Yes, I have!  I love Hawaii.  It's one of my favorite places to go snorkeling.  There are so many beautiful reefs and fish to see.
That sounds amazing!  I've always wanted to go to Hawaii.  Maybe I'll make that my next vacation spot.
I definitely recommend it!  You won't be disappointed.
Thanks for the suggestion!  I'll definitely keep it in mind.
You're welcome!  So, what do you do for fun?
I run my own ice cream business.  I love making ice cream and coming up with new flavors.
That's so cool!  I love ice cream.  What's your favorite flavor?
My favorite flavor is chocolate chip cookie dough.  What's yours?
I love chocolate chip cookie dough too!  I also like mint chocolate chip.
Mint chocolate chip is delicious!  I love the combination of mint and chocolate.
Me too!  So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing about my job is making people happy.  I love seeing people smile when they try my ice cream.
That's a great feeling!  I'm sure you make a lot of people happy.
I hope so!  I love my job.  It's so much fun.
It sounds like you have a really great job.
I do!  I'm very lucky.
I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks
